name: Past Connected
description:
This game is a game that shows the topic of "connection"

In the future, maybe few thousands years later, the time machine and moving back and forth to the past will be possible.

I realized how communicating back to the past and changing the future will be a interesting "connection" topic, so I decided to create this game. The game is created by GameMaker 2.

This game is about the only survivor in the world getting the electricity to charge his phone. You will see why he is charging right in the game!

This is a 1 minute duration game!

Enjoy!
